configuration.name: widget_08875230564237142
configuration.stem: Which statement does this dolphin embryo structure provide evidence for?

feedBack.finalWrongHint: The beginning of a hind leg structure suggests that dolphins are more closely related to mammals.

options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.text: Dolphins are more closely related to other mammals with hind legs than to fish.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.text: Dolphins are more closely related to fish than to other mammals with hind legs.
options.hint: Think about how similarities in embryonic development indicate that organisms are related and share a common ancestor.

options.name: _widget_-028666544011922124
options.hint: Think about how similarities in embryonic development indicate that organisms are related and share a common ancestor.
options.text: Dolphins do not share an evolutionary relationship with other mammals.

options.name: _widget_-045685313536205285
options.hint: Think about how similarities in embryonic development indicate that organisms are related and share a common ancestor.
options.text: Dolphins do not share an evolutionary relationship with fish.
